channel.title: Star Wars: the Old Republic (new MMO, like WoW)
channel.description:
http://www.swtor.com/
Anyone looking forward to this?
I'd go ahead and sign up to get good names while you can.

item.title: Star Wars: the Old Republic (new MMO, like WoW)
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:31, topic:404007”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=501066.msg3695453#msg3695453 date=1312404707]
First of all, comparing it to WoW is massively misleading. Secondly, it’ll most likely suck as an MMO (i wouldn’t even call it an MMO since it revolves around instancing a lot of the content). Perhaps if you treat it like any other single player RPG you’ll enjoy it, but i don’t feel like paying monthly for that.
[/quote]
The PvM and PvP looks pretty similar to WoW, as it you have a list of buttons at the bottom of the screen which you attack with… It was the closest thing to mind.[/quote]
I guess most MMOs are like that, most of the ones I’ve played anyway.

Read full topic
item.source: Star Wars: the Old Republic (new MMO, like WoW)

item.title: Star Wars: the Old Republic (new MMO, like WoW)
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Speljohan:

First of all, comparing it to WoW is massively misleading. Secondly, it’ll most likely suck as an MMO (i wouldn’t even call it an MMO since it revolves around instancing a lot of the content). Perhaps if you treat it like any other single player RPG you’ll enjoy it, but i don’t feel like paying monthly for that.

The PvM and PvP looks pretty similar to WoW, as it you have a list of buttons at the bottom of the screen which you attack with… It was the closest thing to mind.

Read full topic

i don’t feel like paying monthly for that.

This, have you played the prequels?
[/quote]Obviously i’ve played the single player games. Best Star Wars game by far was Galaxies in the early days though![/quote]
Never played it, does it follow the same style like this game?

item.title: Star Wars: the Old Republic (new MMO, like WoW)
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Oh yeah and I forgot to mention that turning the game into a MMO means they basically ruin the KotOR feeling. If you want you can play the game but by the end you can expect to feel a sour taste because of all the incompleteness you’ll see.

Read full topic

item.title: Star Wars: the Old Republic (new MMO, like WoW)
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Not exactly new. I loved KotOR 1 and 2 but sadly like most Bioware games I’ve played they were completely rushed and lacked the deeper elements of foreshadowing in stories and such. The games had so much potential yet they were ruined by the amounts of bugs and obvious cut content from them.

Read full topic
